name: Peter Pang
description:
Peter Pang is a pixel-art platformer game. It is dedicated to all people who liked playing the classic 'Pang' game. It features a new game mechanic that lets you rotate the game world.

Controls:

  • a/d to walk left/right
  • space for jump
  • mouse 0 for fire
  • q/e for rotating game world
  • esc for exit and backspace to reload level

This is my first time here and my first published game. I would appreciate to get any feedback from you.
